channel.title: I'm in C++ Class
channel.description:
And my instructor doesn't know what the fuck he's talking about half the time.
He reminds me of moparscape.

item.title: I'm in C++ Class
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Ckstunner, post:48, topic:229725”][quote author=Ckstunner link=topic=302293.msg2428115#msg2428115 date=1220711060]
Lol…

I’m only posting this so it wont be a one word post
[center] Have a green dot, then.[/center]
[/quote]

Awwwwwwwww, Not cool, Anywaysss, How much do these C++ classes cost ?[/quote]Depends on how many credits.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2008, 11:48:15 am[/size][hr]I felt it unnecessary to make another thread about me bitching about this class, but an update!:
We’re using this program called Alice, which is a fucking joke when it comes to programming (I’d imagine it being like how Flash is written).
http://www.alice.org/

He’s actually going through with it as if it’s programming… This guy, seriously, a fucking idiot. I want to call him out on it. I wonder if he’s actually programmed anything at all.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm in C++ Class
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I’m about to follow a Excel plus course. They told us to sign in for it, and a few days later they told us that we had to finish the basics of Excel first. Wich is total bullshit because who doesn’t know the basics? It will be a huge waste of time.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm in C++ Class
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:49, topic:229725”]WOW, a guy with a “My list” in his sig got warned. This must be srs business.[/quote]owned lol

[quote=“vbcoderx, post:50, topic:229725”]hmm, I took EastLab this year, being told by multiple previous teachers that it was a good class and that we get to go work on the school computers… Well, we do get to go work on the school computers, but, the teacher is a fucking idiot. I know more about computers that her. She had to ask me how to share a printer over the network… We do get to get out of class to go work on computers, which is WIN, but, i think the teacher should have some Certifications or something, before teaching a class about Computers. Apparently, we have to do all this other shite software, like SoftImage and Google Sketchup… We also have to use some stupid GIS/GPS and map our school campus… luckly, she has me so busy doing shit she doesn’t know how to do, she just filled in grades for tutorials we were supposed to do… lol :D[/quote]Holy shit that’s stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm in C++ Class

item.description:
@vbcoderx wrote:

hmm, I took EastLab this year, being told by multiple previous teachers that it was a good class and that we get to go work on the school computers… Well, we do get to go work on the school computers, but, the teacher is a fucking idiot. I know more about computers that her. She had to ask me how to share a printer over the network… We do get to get out of class to go work on computers, which is WIN, but, i think the teacher should have some Certifications or something, before teaching a class about Computers. Apparently, we have to do all this other shite software, like SoftImage and Google Sketchup… We also have to use some stupid GIS/GPS and map our school campus… luckly, she has me so busy doing shit she doesn’t know how to do, she just filled in grades for tutorials we were supposed to do… lol

item.dc:creator: @wow_raped_XD wow_raped XD
item.description:
@wow_raped_XD wrote:

pfft. My tech teacher just tells us about online resources, makes us type all day and dosen’t even know how to code one bit, not even html. All we do in his class is publisher, fireworks, paragraphs, done. He also thinks fireworks is really amazing.

Funny thing is he’s British trying to teach American kids about computers when he dosen’t know shit.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm in C++ Class
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

haha.

i rebel against my history teachers, telling them that teaching me the same damn thing for the last 11 years of my life isn’t helping me. my teacher tried to “calm the class down, because i sent them into a WILD RAGE”. i’m pretty sure he’s referring to the people talking to each other, like every class, because he’s a dumb shit that doesn’t know how to tell the class to shut the fuck up.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm in C++ Class
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:37, topic:229725”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=302293.msg2427826#msg2427826 date=1220694797]
My teacher wanted me to copy some text for some reason, so I highlighted it, hit Ctrl + C and he shouted out me because he didn’t know what I did. Then he made me get out of my seat and sat down himself to click Edit then Copy…
[/quote]
i actually so hate that when teachers do that, you don’t do it their way which is longer and you get told off[/quote]
Thats what I’m hoping will be different in college. Gone through all my school life being told off by teachers for using a shorter method. Then I bring them up on this and they say something like

“In order to do the short method you must know the long method”

then I’m like: I ALREADY UNDERSTAND THE LONG METHOD WHY DO YOU THINK I KNOW THE SHORT METHOD.

Maths sucked ass. Illogical teacher. Got chucked out of that for telling her that her logic floated away out of the window, she got angry at this so I stood on a chair by a window and showed her with hand actions how they go floating out of the window.

/RAGE_SET_TO_OFF

Read full topic

item.title: I'm in C++ Class
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Owned…

And this is what makes my teacher look like Moparscape:
First off, he’s like… Oh, we have this free compiler, I don’t really know the name of it… It’s uhhh, blood… Umm… s-h-e-d.

… First off, that’s an IDE. Second, how does one not know that the four letters that are s-h-e-d form the word SHED. FUCKING SHED IDIOT SHED.

Read full topic
